GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles in reverse chronological order of creation; article content is not provided

sort_by.description: sorts articles by specified column, defaulting to 'created_at', when invoked with a valid query value (e.g. sort_by=title sorts by the title column)

order.description: orders articles in ascending or descending order (defaults to descending)

topics.description: filters articles by specified topic, returning an array of found articles or 404 if no articles for specified topic exist

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an object containing the specified article

exampleResponse.title: Eight pug gifs that remind me of mitch
exampleResponse.author: icellusedkars

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array of objects in reverse chronological order of creation date

exampleResponse.article_title: Living in the shadow of a great man
exampleResponse.body: The beautiful thing about treasure is that it exists. Got to find out what kind of sheets these are; not cotton, not rayon, silky.
exampleResponse.author: butter_bridge

GET: /api/users.description: serves an array of all users

GET: /api/users/:username.description: serves an object containing information on the specified user

POST: /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: adds a comment to the specified article and returns an object containing the comment

POST /api/articles.description: add a new article to the articles table and returns the new article, using a default image url if one is not provided

expectedResponse.author: rogersop
expectedResponse.title: A very interesting article on paper

PATCH: /api/articles/:article_id.description: updates the number of votes for the specified article and returns an object containing the article; vote count can be positive or negative

exampleResponse.title: My excellent article
exampleResponse.author: butter_bridge
exampleResponse.body: A really awesome article about interesting things

PATCH: /api/comments/:comment_id.description: updates the number of votes for the specified comment and returns an object containing the comment; vote count can be positive or negative

exampleResponse.body: Oh, I've got compassion running out of my nose, pal! I'm the Sultan of Sentiment!
exampleResponse.author: butter_bridge

DELETE: /api/comments/:comment_id.description: deletes the comment with the specified ID, and returns no content
